snippet: The photographer Maryam Sahinyan, who died in 1996, worked in a Turkish portrait shop; her unique eye has recently been rediscovered and championed.
lead_paragraph: The photographer Maryam Sahinyan, who died in 1996, worked in a Turkish portrait shop; her unique eye has recently been rediscovered and championed.

headline.main: An Outsider Photographer, and Surprise Aesthete
